original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhim bhaṇḍitvā attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodati

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: ñātibyasanena vā bhogabyasanena vā rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhā rodati na vadhati,
analyzed: ñāti byasanena vā bhoga byasanena vā roga byasanena vā phuṭṭhā rodati na vadhati
